commands.EMBEDFROMXREFS: Embeds raster images from XREFs into the drawing by converting them to OLE objects using PowerPoint, preserving orientation.
commands.EMBEDFROMPDFS: Embeds PDF underlays into the drawing by converting them to PNG and then OLE objects using PowerPoint.
commands.CLEANTBLK: Cleans the title block by exploding blocks, keeping only the title block, detaching XREFs, and embedding images.
commands.CLEANCAD: Cleans the entire sheet by embedding XREFs and performing cleanup operations.
